content: पुरस्तात् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Before, in front of (<ab>oft.</ab> with <ab>gen.</ab> or <ab>abl.</ab>); <ls>R. 2. 44</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 30</ls>; <ls>Me. 15</ls>; or used by itself; अभ्युन्नता पुरस्तात् <ls>Ś. 3. 8.</ls> {@--2@} At the head of, foremost; यः पुरस्ताद्यतीनां <ls>M. 1. 1.</ls> {@--3@} In the first place, at the beginning. {@--4@} Formerly, previously. {@--5@} Eastward, in or towards the east. {@--6@} Later or further on, in the sequel.
